title: ENTOURAGE REBOOT With Creator Doug Ellin! Part 2
itunes:title: ENTOURAGE REBOOT With Creator Doug Ellin! Part 2
description:
Entourage creator and genius writer Doug Ellin is here to talk about everything you ever wanted to know about Entourage. From the casting process, the writing nightmares, dealing with HBO, cast beefs, and of course the Entourage reboot! There’s so much to discuss we need two episodes to do it!

If you have any questions or comments for JP, send us an email at jpiven@kastmedia.com or leave us voicemail https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven

IG: https://www.howulivinjpivenpodcastshow
Twitter: https://www.howulivinjpivshow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HowULivinJPiven/
Doug Ellin's IG: https://www.instagram.com/mrdougellin

Thank you to this week's sponsors:

Rothy's - Get $20 off your first purchase at https://www.rothys.com/piven
